name: No Presents for the Vultures
description:
Sometimes, things don't go the way we want.

Even at Christmas, a lone gift can lose itself in a giant desert. Even worst if birds of prey start attacking it. How could such a poor gift defend itself...

By shooting presents at the vultures of course!


Controls -

Move -  Arrow Keys / WASD

Shoot - Hold Space


Made for the Jam Game 2022 in 2 Days.
  Theme: Christmas / A Gift.

Music:

Mega Rust by Twin Musicom (twinmusicom.org)
